Author: morantis
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: 180719 'Hashed Night' in Korea Blockchain Week : 2. 'DarcMatter'  DarcMatter is a global award winning FinTech platform for alternative investments, created to increase transparency and access within the alternatives industry. Established in 2014, DarcMatter’s platform connects Fund Managers(GPs) actively raising capital with Investors(LPs) globally, to seamlessly connect, access fund documentation, and invest in a curated set of Hedge Funds, Private Equity, and Venture Capital funds efficiently online. Headquartered in New York City, DarcMatter also has offices in Shanghai, Hong Kong, and Seoul, South Korea. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RhTl9yZ0b54&feature=youtu.be

Author: elitecstrike
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: DarcMatter DMC Advisor Series: Welcome Samson Lee, CEO CoinStreet Partners https://medium.com/@DarcMatter/darcmatter-dmc-advisor-series-welcome-samson-lee-ceo-coinstreet-partners-a0f6891523d1  The DarcMatter team is pleased to announce a new addition to the DarcMatter Coin Team of Advisors: Serial tech-entrpreneur, Samson Lee. Sam is no stranger to the world of blockchain, as he has contributed to many ground breaking digital services and e-business operations throughout Asia.  His accomplishments include the world’s first “charge-to-bill” mobile VAS payment service in 2000 with Hutchison Telecom, world’s first verified-by-VISA SMS payment service with VISA and Bank of China in 2002, world’s first mobile e-wallet in 2003 with HKCSL, Asia’s first O2O e-commerce in 2004 with Li & Fung Group, Asia’s first premium Hollywood movies VOD service in 2006 with Videonline, China’s first 3D HD smart TV in 2010, and world’s first 4G premium VOD service in 2012 with China Mobile, and many more blockchain projects to date. Sam’s 20+years of experience in AI, blockchain, cryptocurrency & cryptoassets, will prove most valuable to DarcMatter and their blockchain project.  Currently, Samson is Asia President of Next.TV Inc., the world’s largest global Chinese MCN with over 30 billion minutes watched in 2016. He is also the founder of CoinStreet, the next generation of the “Decentralized Investment Bank” enabling the business ecosystem in the new era of crypto-economy.  With so many accomplishments, Sam’s experience and value as a core advisor is most welcomed by the DarcMatter team. With him as an addition to the DarcMatter Coin Advisor Team, DarcMatter looks forward to advancing global financial services by leaps and bounds in the coming years.

Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: DarcMatter is developing a blockchain based distributed ledger to remove opacity and inefficiencies from the global alternative investment industry. DarcMatter Coin is a utility token that will be used by fund managers and investors to create smart contracts for the investment completion process, and will also be used to access due diligence reports, KYC, and AML details. DMC will be used for a permissioned blockchain, and will use systems that run natively on the NEM blockchain.

Author: CetaNetwork
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: The DarcMatter coin can be held as Singularity Nodes. Singularity Nodes are permitted users or nodes that have at least 15,000 DMC and a necessary volume of transactions to harvest and verify specific transactions. The definition may evolve as the velocity of interactions increases and the complexity of the underlying information increases as well. Participants on the network will be incentivized to further participate the utilize the Tachyon ISC to become a Singularity Node and have the ability to harvest and verify.  Singularity Nodes will be judged by their respective ‘g-factor’8, which will be determined by a number of elements, including contractual complexity mapping from strategy profiles to outcomes9, the Dotson algorithm, nodal linkage history and other proprietary mechanisms. Dependent upon the number of parties and interactions, DarcMatter may have to develop a higher tier node with higher requirements.

Author: DM_Coin
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: We decided to go with NEM vs. ERC20 for a few reasons: 1. The core technology and inception for NEM was specifically created for the more robust financial use case as in the situation with DarcMatter 2. The ease of use with developers and ability to modify the solution we believe to be much better than other blockchains in the market today 3. The ease of a blended public and private use case also drew us as well. 4. PoI (Proof of Importance) is something that is very important to us and we have our own custom modifications to what's important for the network.  In general: NEM has a very strong team of developers and a great vision which was driven around the development of the underlying technology and its efficient use. There has been significant work that has been put into making the NEM blockchain accessible and modifiable in a much more scalable fashion than others including Ethereum. While the technology is very well designed for platform building for secure transactions such as alternative investments, it also utilizes significantly less power in its harvesting process as opposed to high energy use from mining of other cryptocurrencies; all of which create positive benefits for DMC and DarcMatter.

Author: DM_Coin
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: We think the main reason for winning this award was due to our user growth as we continued to build the platform. We were able to onboard more investors in the U.S. and Asia, along with increasing the number of alternative investment firms/funds available on DarcMatter. We were honored to receive the recognition!

Author: DM_Coin
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: https://blog.darcmatter.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/DMC-Main-Image-1-830x360.jpg  DarcMatter is developing a blockchain based distributed ledger to remove opacity and inefficiencies from the global alternative investment industry. DM Coin (DMC) will be used for a permissioned blockchain, and will use systems that run natively on the NEM blockchain.  Tier 1 of the Private Pre-sale has CLOSED AHEAD of Schedule!  DarcMatter (DM), the parent company introducing DarcMatter Coin (DMC) to create significant efficiencies and scalability through blockchain implementation/integration/innovation, has officially announced the closing of the Tier 1 Private Presale, reaching its $5 MM hard cap.  DarcMatter Coin’s Tier 1 Private Pre Sale, began as of December 31st 2017 and was expected to be open until February 28th, 2018. However, after DarcMatter Coin launched their telegram channel on a Friday evening, the tier 1 allotment sold out by Monday, closing out the premier DMC Tier 1 offerings within 48 hours.  DarcMatter’s management team is thrilled by the interest thus far, and continues to connect with the DMC Community via the DMC Telegram Channel (included below)   Tier 2 of the Private Pre-sale has a $5 MM cap and is currently LIVE.  For more information on DarcMatter Coin (DMC) and the DMC White Paper, visit DMC.DarcMatter.Com  For access to the private presale and for questions/comments, please email the team at DMCICO@DarcMatter.com  AND to join in on the conversation with the DMC Community, join our Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/DarcMatter  DarcMatter DMC ICO Community Rewards Program Details can be found here! https://medium.com/@DarcMatter/darcmatter-dmc-ico-community-rewards-program-live-62e2ee072438

Author: aznredpill
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: https://i.imgur.com/TT6nQQe.png ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Sang H. Lee is the Co-Founder and CEO of DarcMatter. A leading pioneer within the Financial Services and Technology industries, Sang has worked to push forward necessary regulatory changes, as well as industry buy-in to achieve much of the platform boarding, the industry has seen today. Sang has been recognized as an ‘Under30CEO Entrepreneur to Watch in New York City’ and a ‘GOOD100’ fellow, an annual list of 100 change making entrepreneurs.  Sang is also an international keynote speaker on various topics within FinTech and Cross Border investments, accepting numerous speaking invitations from the UN, International CES, Harvard University, Brown University, the Council on Foreign Relations, among others. He has also been featured in both domestic and international publications including Forbes, Bloomberg Radio, Private Wealth Magazine, Entrepreneur Magazine, CNBC, FINalternatives, and many more. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Natasha Bansgopaul is the Co-Founder and Chief Operating Officer (COO) of the Global Award Winning FinTech Platform, DarcMatter (DM). She is a part of the founding team of both DarcMatter and Return on Change, joining the company as an experienced marketing and strategy professional with over 10+ years of demonstrated leadership through key strategic roles at both Fortune 50 and Fortune 100 companies. She has successfully lead DM through various startup competitions and conferences, resulting in global awards and recognition such as, NextMoney Global FinTech Finals, “Best Growth Stage FinTech Company”, Korean Startup Grand Challenge (Top 4 out of 120), and HFM Technology “Best FinTech Solution for Hedge Funds.”  Her previous corporate role at PepsiCo provided significant experience in developing global billion-dollar brands through new product innovation, comprehensive go-to-market and social media marketing strategies, and consumer insights research. Her breakthrough and cross-functional collaboration project wins, earned her various awards and accolades, including the company’s “Crushed Can” award for increasing the brand’s market share versus competition. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Stan is a CTO of DarcMatter and have joined the management team in 2013. He is part of the founding team of both Return on Change and DarcMatter. Stan is a pioneer in the technology industry being an early supporter of cutting edge technologies and platforms from the ground up including blockchain. Being an engineer by his education and calling, Stan received Master of Informatics degree at the age of 20. Starting his career early, he has 17 years of experience developing commercial software. He started from Windows API development in early 2000s and later on he covered mobile, server and frontend development working with such verticals as banking, fintech, trading, e-commerce, manufacturing, cloud services, professional services. Now an active participant in the blockchain movement, Stan will lead DarcMatter’s efforts in upgrading its platform. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  See here for more details: https://dmc.darcmatter.com/#section_team

Author: CetaNetwork
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: DMC was created to tokenize an antiquated system. The long term vision, is to replace the traditional centralized investing processes, with blockchain technology solutions to increase transparency and remove/reduce inefficiencies. DMC will be used for a permissioned blockchain, which is one specific type of private blockchain. While having all the benefits of a blockchain, it also permits for the level of discretion and privacy that is often required for the world of alternative funds and investments in general. DarcMatter will utilize a blockchain based distributed ledger which allows all parties necessary for completion of an alternative fund investment (any distribution intermediary, fund reporting entity, fund manager and/or investor), to concurrently and seamlessly be able to view the current and historical transaction record in full.

Author: CetaNetwork
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution

Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE LIVE] DarcMatter Coin (DMC) - The Global Finance Revolution
Body: Hi Celestio -  DarcMatter is the parent company and platform, that has been operational for 3+ years. DM Coin provides the opportunity to release even more financial technology solutions to deliver on DM’s vision: increase transparency and access within alternatives.. DarcMatter is designing, on top of its already operational global platform, an alternative fund marketplace transaction tool powered by smart contracts and the distributed ledger driven by the blockchain. This will combine the necessary implementation of fund administration, distribution, reporting and logistics, which are highly inefficient between fund managers and investors today.  You can watch a presentation and demo of the DarcMatter platform here:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QbgqZUtXx9E  And you can request a demo at: https://darcmatter.com/
